eg.projects

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectActions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlActions, JavaActions, ProjectConfig, TxtActions

    public interface Configurable
    The interface to configure a project

    • Method Summary

      • addOkAction

        void addOkAction(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
        Adds an event handler at the ok button of this SettingsWin object

      • makeSetWinVisible

        void makeSetWinVisible(boolean enable)
        Makes the window of this SettingsWin object visible/invisible
        Parameters:
        enable - true to make the window for project settings visible, false to make it invisible

      • configFromSetWin

        boolean configFromSetWin(java.lang.String dir,
                         java.lang.String suffix)
        If a project was successfully configured based on entries in the window of this SettingsWin object
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory of project's main file
        suffix - the extension of the project's main file

      • findPreviousProjectRoot

        If a previously used project can be assigned to this class
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may include the root directory of a previous project
        Returns:
        if a prvious project could be assigned to this class
